Backwards Bloom

“Backwards Bloom” is a dreamy ambient-electronic track with muted reverse piano notes, soft tape hiss, and swirling analog synths. The atmosphere swells with tension while carrying a nostalgic undertone, creating a soundscape that feels both fragile and expansive. Its experimental layering and reverse-flowing motifs evoke the sensation of time folding in on itself — a bloom caught between memory and distortion. A piece for late-night immersion, meditative listening, or cinematic reflection.

  • Album: Stranger Vibes
  • Genre: ambient, electronic, experimental
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 3:33
